educations.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, AI Specialization
content: Coursework: Computer Archictecture, Data Structures, Web Development, Data Mining, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Software Engineering

description: Built dynamic reporting software and dashboards using ASP.NET Core, Blazor, and SQL Server​
Quickly learned and adapted to new technologies in order to meet deadlines and improve system functionality
Collaborated in cross-departmental teams, contributing to sprint planning and brainstorming sessions
Integrated caching to store frequently accessed ata, reducing database queries and improving response times
Developed state of the art visualization tools for researchers and doctors to envision large biological datasets using ​Angular 11​, Node & Vega.​
Devised an algorithm to compute statistics that highlight anomalies in the data and displayed them on an intuitive interface.
Created detailed UX flows, experience maps, wire-frames and conducted interviews across various biological consortia to enhance user experience.
Developed a web app for mission planning, control and execution using Vue & Flask, thereby improving onside project performance by 22%.​
Designed an icon set for various functionalities using ​Illustrator​, which improved usability by 20%.

blog.title: User Experience Design – A little more than just design
